desc: Scouting memories start with Eagle Peak Store. Award your loved ones or finish your collection. We have Merit Badges, Merit Badge Books, Council Shoulder Patches, Order of the Arrow Flaps, Spoof Patches, Books and Handbooks, Eagle Scout, Cub Scout items, National Jamboree, World Jamboree, Scouting Coins and much more.

layout.text: Get the Scouting Essentials for Your Next Outdoor Adventure
